Analyte(s): IgG antibody to herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SeraQuest HSV Type 1 Specific IgG ELISA for qualitative detection of human IgG antibodies to HSV-1 in serum
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection of human IgG antibodies to HSV-1 in serum as an aid in presumptive diagnosis of HSV-1 infection in sexually active individuals and expectant mothers; not cleared for blood or plasma donor screening or for matrices other than human serum
